our backend environment so this didn't really
work so what was the pros of having hundreds of vpcs well we had strong

groups and knackles to achieve our isolation and you can see there we only

and this is an IM am limitation we couldn't assign a certain

now let me illustrate this as an example now some companies use automated monkeys

so what were the Lessons Learned ensure the team has good domain
experts they need to have a strong understanding of their technical domains

uh firewall rules but in the cloud we have to use things like vpcs and security groups to achieve the same

cider blocks to run fewer ACLS and fewer security groups to allow all that stuff

at the top of each cider block for the VPC in all regions so that way we could
